==== Notes ====

Ubuntu 9.04:

The Hardware Drivers application allows support for the wireless card using proprietary firmware.  Click 'System -> Administration -> Hardware Drivers' and select to use 'Firmware for Broadcom 43xx chipset family.'

Ubuntu 8.04.3:

The Restricted Drivers Manager allows support for the wireless card using proprietary firmware.  Click 'System -> Administration -> Restricted Drivers Manager' and select to use 'Firmware for Broadcom 43xx chipset family.'
